ghostPage.title: Introduction
ghostPage.excerpt:
Welcome to the DSNP Developer Portal!  You’re in the right place if you’re
looking to write applications or learn more about DSNP.

The Idea
A decentralized social networking protocol (DSNP) will allow users to own and
control their social graph, while avoiding the balkanization of the current
social network providers and creating an open ecosystem of network participants.

See the full white paper below.

Whitepaper [https://github.com/LibertyDSNP/papers]The Code
ProjectLiberty.io is our GitHub
ghostPage.plaintext:
Welcome to the DSNP Developer Portal!  You’re in the right place if you’re
looking to write applications or learn more about DSNP.

The Idea
A decentralized social networking protocol (DSNP) will allow users to own and
control their social graph, while avoiding the balkanization of the current
social network providers and creating an open ecosystem of network participants.

See the full white paper below.

Whitepaper [https://github.com/LibertyDSNP/papers]The Code
ProjectLiberty.io is our GitHub organization. Follow the link below to check out
our repos. This is where you can submit new feature requests, bug reports, and
pull requests.

Github [https://github.com/LibertyDSNP]Questions
We invite community discussion and input in our forums.

Forums [https://forums.projectliberty.io/]Further Communication
To reach us privately, please email hello@dsnp.org.

Community [../dev-portal-community/]
ghostPage.html:
Welcome to the DSNP Developer Portal!  You’re in the right place if you’re looking to write applications or learn more about DSNP.

The Idea

A decentralized social networking protocol (DSNP) will allow users to own and control their social graph, while avoiding the balkanization of the current social network providers and creating an open ecosystem of network participants.

See the full white paper below.

Whitepaper

The Code

ProjectLiberty.io is our GitHub organization. Follow the link below to check out our repos. This is where you can submit new feature requests, bug reports, and pull requests.

Github

Questions

We invite community discussion and input in our forums.

Forums

Further Communication

To reach us privately, please email hello@dsnp.org.

Community
